meico.midi

Class Midi2MsmConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.midi.Midi2MsmConverter

  • public class Midi2MsmConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does the MIDI to MSM conversion. To use it, instantiate it with the constructor, then invoke convert(). See method meico.midi.Midi.exportMsm() for some sample code.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convert()
      call this method to do the midi to msm conversion, the global msm will hold the result
      private nu.xom.Element makePart(java.lang.String partName, int port, int channel)
      this is a shortcut for creating an msm part
      private boolean processMetaEvent(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent event)
      this converts midi meta events (midi event with a MetaMessage) to msm
      private boolean processShortEvent(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent event)
      this converts midi short events (midi event with a ShortMesage) to msm
      private boolean processSysexEvent(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent event)
      this converts midi sysex events (midi event with a SysexMesage) to msm; actually, this method does nothing as there is no msm representation of sysex messages right now

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public void convert()
        call this method to do the midi to msm conversion, the global msm will hold the result

      • processMetaEvent

        private boolean processMetaEvent(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent event)
        this converts midi meta events (midi event with a MetaMessage) to msm
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be converted
        Returns:
        true if the event is a meta event, otherwise false as it cannot be converted by this method

      • processShortEvent

        private boolean processShortEvent(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent event)
        this converts midi short events (midi event with a ShortMesage) to msm
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be converted
        Returns:
        true if the event is a short event, otherwise false as it cannot be converted by this method

      • processSysexEvent

        private boolean processSysexEvent(javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent event)
        this converts midi sysex events (midi event with a SysexMesage) to msm; actually, this method does nothing as there is no msm representation of sysex messages right now
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be converted
        Returns:
        true if the event is a sysex event, otherwise false as it cannot be converted by this method
